name: Hootsuite Compact-NoPic-Dark Theme
description: Based on stylesfordays Dark Theme for the new (October 2014) Hootsuie UI. Changes in this version include tighter spacing and smaller fonts. Also, the in-line display of images in the streams is disabled in this version (only text links displayed).
additional_info:
12/15/14 - First version after I accidentally switched to the new UI in Hootsuite this AM.
07/01/16 - Update/partial rewrite after the June '16 update of Hootsuite broke stuff. Links are now blue, pictures in the feed can be toggled.
